content: this adult sized crochet poncho can be worked up in a weekend and is so very easy it only uses 2 rectangles some seaming and the simplest tassel style fringe you ve ever seen it is a great project for those still new to the craft - very beginner friendly it is the perfect size and weight - not too chunky but soft breezy and warm pattern includes sizes xs-4xl womens this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet increase chain stitch and slip_stitch
